Japanese Worship Music

Sanctuary

主イエスの  
Shu Iesu- no-  
きよい御霊に  
Kiyoi Mi-ta-ma-ni-  
満たされ  
Mi-ta-sa--re--  
生きる  
I-ki-ru------  

聖なる  
Sei na-ru-  
宮となーり  
Mi-ya-to- Na--ri--  
よろこび  
Yo-ro-ko-bi-  
歌う  
U-ta-u-    

Lord, prepare me to be a sanctuary  
Pure and holy, tried and true  
With thanksgiving, I’ll be a living  
Sanctuary for you
